title: Haisupe Megane Ha Watashi Izon!?
alternative_title: Is My Elite; Bespectacled Friend Addicted To Me!? ; ハイスペ眼鏡は私依存!? ; High-spec Megane wa Watashi Izon!?
status: Is My Elite; Bespectacled Friend Addicted To Me!? ; ハイスペ眼鏡は私依存!? ; High-spec Megane wa Watashi Izon!?
description:
Description :
        The hard-working OL Rin has a childhood friend who is proud of her good face and able to work. He always helped me in private and in the company and had a sense of trust like his brother. And he said, "We're already lovers." They told me... I'm... I don't remember. Apparently Rin confessed his consciousness of being drunk and obo...! "I'm so happy. I can't stop it. It's all mine. Huh? He tries to explain his adhesive love, but his adhesive love is not great. Sweet and forcibly touched and even proposed?! How is Rin's love battle against Rin's love battle? High-tension obsession love comedy that started with a misunderstanding! Less...
